import { useState } from 'react' import EndQuiz from './EndQuiz'; import './Question.css' const quizData = [ { question: "In 1768, Captain James Cook set out to explore which ocean?", answerOptions :[ {answerText : "Database", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Connectivity", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "User interface", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Design Platform", isCorrect : false}] }, { question: "Everything in reat is _________", answerOptions :[ {answerText : "Module", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Module", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Module", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Module", isCorrect : false}] }, { question: "The lifecycle methods are mainly used for ___", answerOptions :[ {answerText : "keeping track of event history", isCorrect : false}, done while multiple elements need to be returned from a component", answerOptions :[ {answerText : "Abstraction", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Packing", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Insulation", isCorrect : false}, {answerText : "Wrapping", isCorrect : false}] }, { question: "Everything in reat is _________", answerOptions :[ {answerText : "Module", isCorrect : false},
